items.title: Slot legt vinger op zere Liverpool-plek: 'Helaas wordt dat niet erkend'
items.summary: Arne Slot baalt flink van de remise van Liverpool thuis tegen promovendus Leeds United . De Nederlandse manager zag zijn ploeg moeite hebben met een compact georganiseerde opponent. Hij legde de vinger op de zere plek.

items.title: Chelsea confirm Maresca exit amid poor PL run
items.summary: Chelsea confirmed Thursday they have parted ways with manager Enzo Maresca ahead of Sunday's game against Manchester City.

items.title: Leeds force stalemate to end Liverpool winning run
items.summary: Liverpool's winning run was brought to a grinding halt as Leeds claimed their first clean sheet since August with the new year bringing more frustration for Arne Slot's side.

items.title: Sources: Spurs' Johnson agrees move to Palace
items.summary: Tottenham winger Brennan Johnson has agreed to join Crystal Palace in a deal worth ¬£35 million ($47.2m), sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Gabon govt. suspends team over AFCON flop
items.summary: Gabon's government have come down hard on the country's national team following their shambolic performance at the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON).

items.title: Liverpool needed more pace to break through difficult Leeds defence - Slot
items.summary: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says his side needed more pace to break through and create chances against Leeds United's low block, following their goalless draw at Anfield.

items.title: FC Volendam heeft AZ-middenvelder Kwakman bijna binnen
items.summary: Dave Kwakman (21) gaat het seizoen vrijwel zeker afmaken bij FC Volendam. Wanneer onverwachte wendingen uitblijven, zal AZ de middenvelder voor een halfjaar uitlenen aan de club uit zijn geboortedorp.

items.title: Rosenior leading contender for Chelsea job
items.summary: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading contender to be the next Chelsea manager, but others remain under consideration.

items.title: Tom Cairney earns Fulham a point at Crystal Palace with late leveller
items.summary: It‚Äôs a strange quirk of this fixture that the away side hasn‚Äôt lost for the last 10 Premier League matches, and substitute Tom Cairney‚Äôs late equaliser ensured that the streak goes on. Only a brilliant save in injury-time from Dean Henderson and a glaring miss from former Crystal Palace player Joachim Andersen denied Fulham all three points after they had fallen behind to Jean-Philippe Mateta‚Äôs first goal from open play since 1 November. But Oliver Glasner will still be bitterly disappointed that his side couldn‚Äôt end a sequence of six games without a victory in all competitions after running out of steam again in their 31st match of the season. Continue reading...

items.title: Ipswich rise into Championship‚Äôs top two as rivals Coventry and Boro slip up
items.summary: Philogene and Akpom goals secure 2-1 win over Oxford Charlton hold Coventry 1-1; Derby upset Middlesbrough Ipswich climbed into the automatic promotion places in the Championship following a 2-1 victory over struggling Oxford. Their success came via first-half goals from leading scorer Jaden Philogene and Chuba Akpom, while Will Lankshear replied for the visitors. Ipswich moved a point above Middlesbrough after they fell to a 1-0 defeat at Derby, while Oxford remain three points from safety. Continue reading...

items.title: 'Besiktas laat sterspeler om 04.00 uur trainen, zaak ligt bij de FIFA'
items.summary: De situatie rondom sterspeler Rafa Silva bij Besiktas houdt de gemoederen in Turkije bezig. Naar verluidt forceert de Turkse topclub de Portugese aanvaller richting de uitgang met kleine pesterijen. De zaak zou zijn voorgelegd aan de FIFA.

items.title: 'Ruthless' Littler thrashes Ratajski with Humphries vs Van Veen up next LIVE!
Obdurate Leeds keep toiling Liverpool at arm‚Äôs length to earn point
items.summary: Two unbeaten records continued at Anfield but only one team could take satisfaction from that. Leeds succeeded in stifling and frustrating Liverpool as the first goalless draw of Arne Slot‚Äôs reign underlined the limitations that linger behind the Premier League champions‚Äô recent recovery. A drab scoreless draw, the first in 84 Liverpool games under Slot, owed much to the defensive dominance of the excellent Jaka Bijol and Pascal Struijk but also the home side‚Äôs inability to break down a compact Leeds unit. Liverpool were reduced to hopeful half chances and there was a smattering of boos around Anfield as the final whistle sounded on a laboured performance. Continue reading...

items.title: Enzo Maresca forgot Chelsea‚Äôs golden rule: the manager does not call the shots | Jacob Steinberg
items.summary: Manager toed the line at Stamford Bridge with one eye on the Manchester City job, frustrating fans and his employers It was late on New Year‚Äôs Eve when Chelsea‚Äôs patience ran out. They knew that Enzo Maresca was attempting to engineer an exit from the club and now they were ready to call his bluff. Midnight was approaching and the fireworks at Stamford Bridge were about to erupt. A baffling story soon had a familiar, predictable ending. Maresca, who is not the first manager to run out of friends at Chelsea, had taken the provocations too far. There was surprise when he told staff that he did not want to conduct his post-match press conference after the disappointing 2-2 draw with Bournemouth on Tuesday night. The official explanation was that Maresca was too unwell to talk in public, despite having just spent the evening coaching on the Stamford Bridge touchline, but the friction was palpable and it was never going to sit well with the Chelsea hierarchy when it took less than 24 hours for reports to emerge that the sickness line was a red herring and their head coach had actually decided not to meet the media because he needed time to consider his options. It was further confirmation that this was someone who wanted to be sacked. Maresca dared Chelsea to act and will have been the least surprised person in the world to find himself unemployed less than a day into 2026. Continue reading...

items.title: Leeds hold Liverpool to goalless draw at Anfield
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Liverpool‚Äôs match against Leeds United in the Premier League.

items.title: Liverpool toil in limp draw at home to Leeds
items.summary: Liverpool began 2026 with a whimper as they were held to a 0-0 draw with an impressive Leeds at Anfield on New Year‚Äôs Day.

items.title: New year, old hero! Cairney rescues point for Fulham as Palace winless run extends
items.summary: Tom Cairney came off the bench to net a stunner to secure Fulham a 1-1 draw at Selhurst Park as Crystal Palace's festive rot dripped into the new year, extending the Eagles' run without a win to five games.

items.title: Maak kennis met de motor van Arne Slot
items.summary: Sinds Arne Slot een vaste plek op het middenveld heeft vrijgemaakt voor Curtis Jones (24) is Liverpool gaan winnen. Dat is niet toevallig. De Engelsman verstuurt passes die cruciaal zijn in de speelwijze van Slot.
